member.name: P:Limilabs.Proxy.ProxyClientBase.ReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time the underlying will wait to receive data once a read operation is initiated.

member.name: P:Limilabs.Proxy.ProxyClientBase.SendTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time the underlying will wait for a send operation to complete successfully.

member.name: T:Limilabs.Proxy.Socks4Proxy.Socks4aProxyClient
member.remarks: In Socks version 4A if the client cannot resolve the destination host's domain name to find its IP address the server will attempt to resolve it.

member.summary: Sets proxy credentials.

member.summary: This exception is thrown when proxy error occurs.

member.summary: Initializes new instance of ProxyException with serialized data.
member.param: Serialized object data.
Contextual information.

member.name: T:Limilabs.Proxy.IProxyClient
member.summary: Proxy client interface. This is the interface that all proxy clients implement.

member.name: P:Limilabs.Proxy.IProxyClient.ReceiveTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time the underlying will wait to receive data once a read operation is initiated.

member.name: P:Limilabs.Proxy.IProxyClient.SendTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time the underlying will wait for a send operation to complete successfully.

member.name: M:Limilabs.Proxy.IProxyClient.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a remote TCP connection through a proxy server to the destination host on the destination port.
member.param: Destination host name or IP address.
Port number to connect to on the destination host.
member.returns: Returns an open object that can be used normally to communicate with the destination server

member.name: M:Limilabs.Proxy.IProxyClient.BeginConnect(System.String,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous request for a proxy server connection.
member.param: Destination host name or IP address.
Port number to connect to on the destination host.
The AsyncCallback delegate.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous connection.

member.name: M:Limilabs.Proxy.IProxyClient.EndConnect(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends a pending asynchronous proxy connection request, sends remote server connection request to the proxy server.
member.param: Object that stores state information and any user defined data for this asynchronous operation.
member.returns: Returns an open object that can be used normally to communicate with the destination server

member.summary: Factory method for creating new proxy client objects.
member.param: The type of proxy client to create.
The proxy host or IP address.
The proxy port number.
The proxy user.
The proxy password. This parameter is only used by Http and Socks5 proxy objects.
